attributes.action: Charge Anjem Choudary under section 31 of The Crime and Disorder Act 1998
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Anjem Choudary continually makes sickening outbursts against the British way of life, our troops, our culture and is continually behind demos against our returning troops. He should be charged Under section 31 of the Crime and Disorder Act 1998 which states racially or religiously aggravated disorderly behaviour with intent to cause harassment, alarm or distress, is a crime punishable by up to two years in jail. 
Let's stop this man now before he really causes problems.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the police. Please contact them directly.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
